review: While I think the Fire TV Stick is great, I do think it's a little ridiculous it doesn't come with the same voice command remote the full Fire TV does. I appreciate the pricing of the Fire Stick, but I'd happily pay $15 more for one that came with the voice command capabilities.
author: phil braun

review: This is a really cool device, though I wish there were more apps for it I can't complain too much. Assembly and setup were very easy.

review: My children and I love it

review: It was really easy to set up. I can use it for Netflix and prime live streaming, and I don't need to go on to the website to add programs.
author: jessica schultheis

review: It was easy to install and the voice remote works pretty well. I am disappointed that Amazon forces you to buy the non voice remote ( value 14.99 on Amazon's website ).If you really only want to get the voice remote, you must spend an extra $ 29.99. I consider this unethical and unfair on Amazon's part. This issue has been brought to Amazon's attention by other buyers of this product, but Amazon has yet to stop this abusive sales practice. The Fire Stick does work as advertised although sometimes you have to repeat voice commands.
